mapper.update:
update mkt_strategy_conf_rule set
MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_NAME = #{mktStrategyConfRuleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAR_GRP_ID = #{tarGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{evtContactConfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID = #{mktCamChlResultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{mktStrategyConfRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_NAME, TAR_GRP_ID, PRODUCT_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf_rule where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{mktStrategyConfRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_NAME, TAR_GRP_ID, PRODUCT_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf_rule

select cr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, cr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_NAME,cr.MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID, cr.TAR_GRP_ID, cr.PRODUCT_ID, cr.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID from mkt_strategy_conf_rule cr left join mkt_strategy_conf_rule_rel crr on cr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = crr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID where crr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_NAME, TAR_GRP_ID, PRODUCT_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, MKT_CAM_CHL_RESULT_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf_rule where TAR_GRP_ID = #{tarGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
